group_1.textRight: That's the second checkpoint cleared.

group_1.textLeft: ...It’s kind of nice collecting all the stamps.

group_1.textRight: Haha!
...Oh, I forgot to ask a question.

group_1.textLeft: We had to ask each other twenty questions,@right?

group_1.textRight: Umm… Ms. Kuroe, would you mind telling me@where you're from?

group_1.textLeft: ...Takarazaki.

group_1.textRight: [chara:100101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]..!?@[wait:0.8][chara:100101:cheek_0][chara:100101:lipSynch_1]What a coincidence, me too!

group_1.textLeft: Is that so?

group_1.textRight: I thought you were from Kamihama, Ms. Kuroe.
..Oh, though I only recently moved to Kamihama,@due to my circumstances.

group_1.textLeft: Is it...because you heard of the rumors?

group_1.textRight: No, it was for a different reason…
Is the rumor you’re talking about…
…the one that says “come to Kamihama,@where Magical Girls can be saved”?

group_1.textLeft: So you heard the rumor too, Iroha?

group_1.textRight: But, I heard it from other people...

group_1.textLeft: ...I see.
Then, why did you move to Kamihama?

group_1.textRight: My sister is missing, and I’m here to look@for clues.

group_1.textLeft: ...I’m sorry for asking too much...
I hope you find her soon.

group_1.textRight: Thank you...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, there’s a fork in the road,@which way do we go?

group_1.textRight: Why don’t we say our choices at the same time?

group_1.textLeft: Sounds good to me.

group_1.textRight: One, two…
Ah, we picked the same path.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...@Then let’s take the right path.

group_1.textRight: That’s the third point we’ve cleared.

group_1.textLeft: ...Iroha, your stamping technique is pretty.

group_1.textRight: So is yours, Ms. Kuroe.
They’re all aligned the same way,@it’s very precise.

group_1.textLeft: I’m usually not that precise, but for some reason,@I really wanted them to be uniform...

group_1.textRight: Ah, I see..
It’s not like we’re going to show it to anyone,@but somehow I got a little bit curious.

group_1.textLeft: The next stamp stand is located…@[chara:104301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:104301:cheek_0][chara:104301:face_mtn_ex_050.exp3.json][chara:104301:motion_0][chara:104301:lipSynch_1]Oh, right here…

group_1.textRight: It’s like... a campsite, isn’t it?
I didn’t expect the fourth stamp stand to be here...

group_1.textLeft: It's surprising.

group_1.textRight: There’s only one stamp left…@And one question remaining.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, we talked for a while, didn’t we...

group_1.textRight: Hmmm, last question...

group_1.textLeft: I’d prefer if it wasn’t related to the@Wings of Magius...

group_1.textRight: O-of course…
Then… Ms. Kuroe, what do you see yourself doing@in the future?
S-sorry, if you don't want to answer that,@I'll ask something else!

group_1.textLeft: No, it’s just…@I don’t really know, myself…
What about you, Iroha?

group_1.textRight: I’m sorry, I shouldn’t have asked…@I haven't decided, either...

group_1.textLeft: ...I see.

group_1.textRight: …We’re kind of similar, aren’t we?

group_1.textLeft: Huh..?

group_1.textRight: Umm, sorry!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I’m not mad or anything…@I’m just surprised…
(I honestly thought the same way…)

group_1.textRight: “We’re both Magical Girls from Takarazaki@determined to find something…”
“And we’re both unsure of what our dreams@in the future are…”
...Was all the impression I got.

group_1.textLeft: Also… we tend to concern ourselves with our surroundings and end up being pessimistic...

group_1.textRight: Huh..!?

group_1.textLeft: Yes…@I think we’re similar…

group_1.textRight: Oh…@Yachiyo and Sana, Tsuruno and Felicia too...
Welcome back, Iroha!@It wasn’t easy visiting all five stands, was it?

group_1.textLeft: This is our fourth place though…

group_1.textRight: Huh, aren’t ya guys slow?
We already finished…

group_1.textLeft: Eh, really!?
Maybe we are a bit slow…

group_1.textRight: Let’s get to the fifth point then!
